pullRequest.title: Log ClientAbortException at debug level
pullRequest.bodyText:
While running a large cluster and queries fail, ClientAbortExceptions
become intrusive in the error log. To better debug queries while running
on large clusters (10s of segments per segment host), log the stacktrace
at the debug level, and give hints how to surface the exception.

commit.message:
Log ClientAbortException in debug level

While running a large cluster and queries fail, ClientAbortExceptions
become intrusive in the error log. To better debug queries while running
on large clusters (10s of segments per segment host), log the stacktrace
at the debug level, and give hints how to surface the exception.

nodes.bodyText: good idea, but maybe log one message or another, depending on the log level. Having 2 log lines for DEBUG level will be messy when all threads are logging, it will be hard to cross-correlate
